name: Astro Bound
description:
Concept

Astro Bound is a remake of the classic game Asteroids, although with more explosions, enemies, and maze like levels! Try to get a top score!

Overview

The game features two possible ships to choose from on your journey through space, as well as a turret on top of both that can be controlled at any time by a second player. Enemies include asteroids, ships, and boss ships.

Development

AstroBound was created by AstroBound studios for a Casual Games class at the University of Central Florida during the Fall 2017 term. The team consisted of three people and took place over the entire semester, which was 16 weeks.
